name: Squirrel-Run
description:
Controls: Press ANY Key, Mouse-Button or Screen to Jump

Squirrel-Run is a prototype for a small infinite runner made for web and mobile. Can you help this little squirrel get through the upcoming winter by collecting all the acorns on your way? Great, but watch out for the branches otherwise the squirrel will hurt it's head!

I made this game over the last weeks in my free time. So the game is unfinished and may contain bugs. Also the game is just a prototype focused on graphics and not primarly gameplay. I really appreciate your feedback!

Thank you for your feedback and support!

All rights reserved, please do not distribute this game without my permission.
